helpUsDescription: Are you an investor or a developer? Contact us.
forInvestorsDescription: Become part of the early investors to grow with us, many benefits await you.
forInvestorsCTADescription: Use the button below to contact us and get more information.
forInvestorsCTALabel: I want to invest in Etherna
forDevelopersDescription: Develop a revolutionary product with us, the future is calling you.
forDevelopersCTADescription: Use the button below to contact us and get an interview.
forDevelopersCTALabel: I want to work for Etherna
informationText: For any other information don't hesitate to contact us at info@etherna.io
